column5: Business Ready. Gorgeous, well furnished with a well stocked kitchen in the heart of it all close to biking and jogging trails near the bayou. Contemporary modern in most affluent neighborhood.  Near midtown, ball park , downtown , discovery green,midtown nightlife ,heights, Washington Ave .med center, zoo, museum district  strictly upto 2 adults. Restaurant, event venues, whole foods and grocery stores in walking distance, biking trails, kayak rentals just across. serviced by uber & metro.
column8: Modern Spacious RiverOaks Apt Midtown/Med ct/dwtn
